question: A Museum Near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary / unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary / unpaid work at the museum.Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary / unpaid work.In your letter- explain why you want to do voluntary / unpaid work at the museum- describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful- give details of when you would be available for work
text: I am writing this letter with regard to inform you that I am interested in the part-time voluntary job which was mentioned in yesterday newspaper. I would like to apply for that job. My name is Yan and I am a part-time university student from Teesside.

As a part-time student, I have plenty of spare time to do things which is useful to me. I consider voluntary work for museums to be a kind of interesting thing to me because I am really interested in arts and history. Moreover, I do understand that voluntary work is a sort of helping to society. Another thing that I choose for this job is the location of your museum. It is near my house around the corner of my street.

I am good at some computer skills such as Microsoft word, excel, PowerPoint...etc. I am not sure what kind of specific skill are you looking for but I hope, the skills that I have would be fulfilled your expectation.
I will be available every weekend and on public holidays from 10 am to 5pm. I would appreciate it if you can give me the lunch break around 12 to 1 pm.
I look forward to hearing from you soon about this.
